description: This is a real treat, using tender beef fillet marinated in hot chilli sauce,sesame, lemongrass, and honey. Sear briefly to serve rare.
name: Sesame Soy Glazed Beef Skewers Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 2 lemongrass stalks, tender stalk only, finely chopped

recipeInstructions.text: Cut the beef into 20 cubes. Cut the spring onions diagonally into 20 lengths. Cut the capsicums into 20 pieces.

For the glaze, combine the lemongrass, honey, oils, soy, chilli sauce,and salt and pepper in a non-metallic bowl. Add beef, spring onions, and capsicum. Toss to coat each piece well. Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Thread 1 piece each of spring onion and pepper and 1 beef cube on to each presoaked skewer.

Preheat grill. Alternatively, preheat a heavy frying pan with oil. Either Grill or sear beef skewers until browned but still pink and juicy inside, 3 minutes on each side. Sprinkle with sesame seeds and serve hot.
